description: This file defines a users model for MongoDB including functions to access the users collection and find users by email or phone.

methods.name: usersCollection
methods.description: Returns the users collection from the database.

methods.name: findUserByEmail
methods.description: Finds a user document in the collection by email address.

methods.name: findUserByPhone
methods.description: Finds a user document in the collection by phone number.
